main event: Multiple witnesses in Killeen, Texas observed unidentified aerial objects on various dates in November 1954.
interesting points: A woman saw a bright white light that appeared stationary for 2 minutes before moving rapidly,The US Army helicopter crew reported a white spherical or cigar-shaped object hovering silently nearby,Several reports identified similar sightings in the area around the same time,Objects were described as possibly being balloons or unidentified vehicles,No physical evidence was found to support the sightings.
sighted object: unidentified aerial objects, including a bright light and a spherical or cigar-shaped object
witness description: Mrs. XXXXX and crew of a US Army helicopter
